com.yworks.yfiles.view

Class FocusIndicatorManager<T extends ILookup>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yworks.yfiles.view.ModelManager<T>
      • com.yworks.yfiles.view.FocusIndicatorManager<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the items.

    public class FocusIndicatorManager<T extends ILookup>
extends ModelManager<T>
    A ModelManager implementation that manages the visual decoration of the focused element in a canvas.

    For the item that should be focused this class uses the ILookup mechanism of the item to lookup an IFocusIndicatorInstaller implementation which will do the actual installation of the decoration in the canvas.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FocusIndicatorManager(CanvasControl canvas)
      Creates an instance that for all focused items in the model dynamically installs a decoration.

      • getCanvasObjectGroup

        protected ICanvasObjectGroup getCanvasObjectGroup(T item)
        Callback used by ModelManager.install(java.lang.Object) to retrieve the installer for a given item.

        This implementation always returns the FocusGroup of the Canvas of this instance.

        Specified by:
        getCanvasObjectGroup in class ModelManager<T extends ILookup>
        Parameters:
        item - The item to find a canvas object group for.
        Returns:
        An ICanvasObjectGroup or null

      • getFocusedItem

        public final T getFocusedItem()
        Gets the focused item, updates the canvas and fires the corresponding property change event.
        Returns:
        The focused item, which can be null.
        See Also:
        setFocusedItem(ILookup)

      • getInstaller

        protected ICanvasObjectInstaller getInstaller(T item)
        Callback used by ModelManager.install(java.lang.Object) to retrieve the installer for a given item.

        This implementation uses the ILookup.lookup(java.lang.Class) of the item to retrieve an IFocusIndicatorInstaller instance.

        Specified by:
        getInstaller in class ModelManager<T extends ILookup>
        Parameters:
        item - The item to find an installer for.
        Returns:
        An installer or null

      • getShowFocusPolicy

        public final ShowFocusPolicy getShowFocusPolicy()
        Gets the show focus policy.

        The default is ShowFocusPolicy.WHEN_FOCUSED.

        Returns:
        The show focus policy. Changing this property influences the visibility of the rendering depending on the current value of Focused attribute.
        See Also:
        setShowFocusPolicy(ShowFocusPolicy)

      • isFocused

        public final boolean isFocused()
        Gets a value indicating whether the container this manager is installed in currently is focused.
        Returns:
        true if the container is currently focused; false otherwise. Depending on the ShowFocusPolicy, this will influence the visibility of the rendering.
        See Also:
        setFocused(boolean)
